org.drip.param.definition

Class Quote

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.param.definition.Quote
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiSidedQuote

    public abstract class Quote
extends Serializer
    This interface contains the stubs corresponding to a product quote. It contains the quote value, quote instant for the different quote sides (bid/ask/mid).
